effect_entries.effect: Teaches Dig to a compatible Pokémon.
effect_entries.short_effect: Teaches Dig to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.text:
１ターン目に　潜り　２ターン目で
相手を　攻撃する。
どうくつからの　脱出も　できる。

The user burrows, then attacks
on the next turn. It can also
be used to exit dungeons.

Chi la usa scava al primo turno e attacca al
successivo. Fuori dalla lotta fa uscire da alcuni
luoghi.

Si el objetivo es del sexo opuesto, el
enamoramiento reducirá las probabilidades
de que ataque.

Eine Attacke über 2 Runden. Zunächst gräbt sich
der Angreifer ein, anschließend erfolgt der Angriff.

Le lanceur creuse au premier tour et frappe au
second. Permet aussi de sortir des grottes.

1턴째에 파고들어 2턴째에
상대를 공격한다.
동굴에서 탈출할 수도 있다.

１ターンめに　もぐり　２ターンめで
こうげきする。　どうくつで　つかうと
そとに　だっしゅつ　できる。

The user burrows, then attacks on the
second turn. It can also be used to
exit dungeons.

The user burrows, then attacks on the
second turn. It can also be used to
exit dungeons.

Le lanceur creuse au 1er tour et
frappe au 2è. Permet aussi de
s’échapper d’un donjon.

The user burrows, then attacks on the
second turn. It can also be used to
exit dungeons.

second turn. It can also be used to

The user burrows, then attacks on the
second turn. It can also be used to

An attack that hits
on the 2nd turn.
Can also be used
to exit dungeons.

the 1st turn, then
strikes next turn.
